snippet: “Xul Solar and Jorge Luis Borges: The Art of Friendship,” at the Americas Society, examines the influence the Argentine painter Xul Solar had on the writer Jorge Luis Borges.
abstract: Xul Solar and Jorge Luis Borges: The Art of Friendship exhibit at the Americas Society examines the influence the Argentine painter had on the writer; show focuses on Xul Solar's watercolors, but also includes manuscripts by both men, documents, photographs and first editions of works they created together that are little known outside Argentina.
lead_paragraph: “Xul Solar and Jorge Luis Borges: The Art of Friendship,” at the Americas Society, examines the influence the Argentine painter Xul Solar had on the writer Jorge Luis Borges.

headline.seo: ‘Xul Solar and Jorge Luis Borges’ at Americas Society
